post:
Dear community, Public ninja testing is started. Test VMs will be released in 5 tiers of 100 VMs.

You will have opportunity to test IPv6 ONLY ninja for 30 days. To get your FREE ninja please navigate to dirtcheap.ninja and order your basic IPv6 Ninja with promo code ninja.tester

Hurry up

Code: 
Promo code is valid for one month of service.
Promo code is valid only for basic IPv6 Ninja Config
Promo code is valid only for 100 testers in one tier ( x5 )
Promo code will be reactivated after few days
